articlepost.author: Nick Carver
articlepost.title: All Leonardo DiCaprio Movies You Can Watch on Netflix Right Now
articlepost.excerpt: Despite the fact that Leonardo DiCaprio has been one of the biggest movie stars for two decades and has grown up in front of audiences' eyes, there is still an unfathomable element to Leo.

articlepost.author: Andres Pineda
articlepost.title: Lino Brocka Films That You Should Watch
articlepost.excerpt: Lino Brocka is a Filipino filmmaker who rose to prominence in the world film community with his documentaries about the dictatorship of Ferdinand Marcos. He is well known for the film Insiang, which earned positive reviews at Cannes.

articlepost.author: Nick Carver
articlepost.title: Director Joe Russo Explains Why Iron Man Died In Endgame But Captain America Did Not.
articlepost.excerpt: Joe Russo, co-director of Avengers: Endgame, discusses why they chose to complete Iron Man's MCU narrative by murdering him, but not Captain America.

articlepost.author: Nick Carver
articlepost.title: Will Smith Smacking Chris Rock At The Oscars In 2022 Appears To Have Jaden Smith's Support
articlepost.excerpt: Will Smith struck Chris Rock after the latter's Jada Pinkett Smith joke at the 2022 Oscars, prompting Jaden Smith to express his support for his father.

articlepost.author: Nick Carver
articlepost.title: 'Drive My Car,' an Oscar-nominated film by Ryusuke Hamaguchi, has been added to the Criterion Collection
articlepost.excerpt: 'Drive My Car' is the first Japanese film to receive an Oscar nomination for Best Picture.

articlepost.author: Nick Carver
articlepost.title: Director Says Morbius Has Endless Marvel Crossover Possibilities.
articlepost.excerpt: Exclusive: Director Daniel Espinosa discusses potential future Marvel crossovers as Morbius becomes the latest film in Sony's Spider-Man Universe.

articlepost.author: Nick Carver
articlepost.title: The Sequel To 'godzilla Vs. Kong' Will Begin Filming In Australia This Year
articlepost.excerpt: 'Godzilla vs. Kong' was also shot in Queensland, Australia in 2021.

articlepost.author: Nick Carver
articlepost.title: Actor who played Gilgamesh in the Eternals is said to be returning for a new MCU film or show.
articlepost.excerpt: Don Lee, who played Gilgamesh in the Eternals, is rumored to be reprising his role as Gilgamesh in a secret MCU Phase 4 film or series set to begin production this summer.

articlepost.author: Nick Carver
articlepost.title: Gilgamesh from The Eternals, Approves of His MCU Action Figure
articlepost.excerpt: Don Lee, who plays Gilgamesh in Marvel's The Eternals, is seen approving of Hot Toys' action figurines based on his role.

articlepost.author: Nick Carver
articlepost.title: After No Way Home, Marisa Tomei Wants To Reprise Her Role As Aunt May In The Marvel Cinematic Universe
articlepost.excerpt: Following her sad death in last year's Spider-Man: No Way Home, Marisa Tomei confesses that she would love to reprise her role as Aunt May.
